titleStmt.title: Mœoniæ. Or, Certaine excellent poems and spirituall hymnes: omitted in the last impression of Peters complaint being needefull thereunto to be annexed, as being both diuine and wittie. All composed by R.S.
titleStmt.author: Southwell, Robert, Saint, 1561?-1595.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Valentine Sims, for Iohn Busbie,
